name: The Adventures of Panzer: Dmuscles
description:
The Adventures of Panzer: DMuscles 

The dreaded zombie virus has been unleased in Zergadins medical clinic! Join D.Muscles, from the Adventures of Panzer, as he either attempts to save as many patients as possible ... or just PURGES the infected. Armed with his trusty flame thrower and his in depth knowledge of medicine; D.Muscles Dodges Ghosts, rides moving platforms and torches zombies (or patients) in an attempt to stop the undead scourge from destroying mankind!

Do whatever it takes to stop the zombie apocalypse! 

Just don't forget to refuel .... 

Byte-off 3 - Revival

This is an Early NESmaker Byte-off 3 Submission! This game is a concept demo for the contest. Feedback is very welcome, but only good feedback though. Any negative feedback will need to be reworded to sound like its positive. D.Muscles is a very sensitive soul! 

Recommended NES Emulator is FCEUX : https://fceux.com/web/home.html 

SOCIAL MEDIA:
